law.catch_line: Administrative regulations for reviewing and resolving claims of factual errors in adopted textbooks.

text.section: The Kentucky Board of Education shall promulgate administrative regulations to establish procedures for reviewing and resolving claims of factual errors found in textbooks after adoption by the State Textbook Commission.

law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 72, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011.
